name: Upbeat Melody Project
description:
Tap to the rhythm of Japanse songs! Play the official music and all songs made by the community on a level that suits you!

Unlock all songs reading the band stories in a visual novel style!

Use the character's skills to get more power, energy and score by playing on a live!

Get different cute anime girls! And know more about them.

This game is perfect to people who enjoy:
  • Anime Music
  • Japanese Anime Songs
  • Vocaloid Songs
  • GUMI songs
  • Rhythm games with simple controls
  • Rhythm games for mobile phones
  • Offline rhythm games
  • Free rhythm games
  • Anime Games
  • Visual novel on mobile phones
Download More songs here!

https://dannygaray60.blogspot.com/p/free-download-custom-songs-for-upbeat.html

Make your custom songs with this tutorial

https://dannygaray60.blogspot.com/p/how-make-custom-songs-for-upbeat-melody.html
